subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Music
lead_paragraph: Georgia Frontiere was thrust into the pro football world in April 1979 when her husband, Carroll Rosenbloom, died, leaving her majority ownership of the Los Angeles Rams.
snippet: Georgia Frontiere was thrust into the pro football world in April 1979 when her husband, Carroll Rosenbloom, died, leaving her majority ownership of the Los Angeles Rams.
